articles.title: Unacademy to slash 12% of workforce in another round of layoffs - Economic Times
articles.description: The edtech company had cut its headcount by 1,350 across two rounds of layoffs last year, while its subsidiary Relevel had fired 40 employees in January this year.
articles.content: Edtech startup Unacademy is cutting 12% of its workforce in another round of layoffs, according to an internal memo sent on Thursday by CEO Gaurav Munjal. ET has seen a copy of the memo.Munjal told e… [+2684 chars]

articles.title: NASA Astronomy Picture of the Day 30 March 2023: Globular star cluster and Dark Doodad Nebula - HT Tech
articles.description: Today’s NASA Astronomy Picture of the Day is the Dark Doodad Nebula which lies beside the globular star cluster NGC 4372.
articles.content: After the formation of stars takes place in a nebula, many of them form groups from the same Nebula, forming a Star Cluster. Star clusters can contain as few as ten stars or as many as millions of st… [+2040 chars]

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Microsoft introduces AI-powered cybersecurity assistant - HT Tech
articles.description: The Microsoft tool, named 'Security Copilot', is a simple prompt box that will help security analysts with tasks like summarizing incidents, analyzing vulnerabilities and sharing information with co-workers on a pinboard.
articles.content: Microsoft Corp on Tuesday launched a tool to help cybersecurity professionals identify breaches, threat signals and better analyze data, using OpenAI's latest GPT-4 generative artificial intelligence… [+799 chars]
